text:
The celebrations are endless for Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas. After their lavish wedding in Udaipur and endless receptions in India and the US, now it's time for celebration yet again!
Nick and PC rang in Game of Thrones star Sophie Turner’s birthday party on February 21. The pictures and videos have flooded social media and the party looked like a complete fam-jam event.
Instagram
While PC is seen in a black sweater, pair of jeans and heels, Nick is seen in casuals. Like a doting sister-in-law, Priyanka Chopra posted a sweet message for Sophie.
She wrote:
Don't Miss 365 SHARES 161 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 186 SHARES
“To one of the most beautiful, fun people I’ve known. Happy birthday @sophiet you are loved! I can’t wait to see you as a bride. You will be stunning! Have a brilliant year love.. #jsisters 4eva! @joejonas you r the most thoughtful! Last night was epic.”
Here are some more pictures and videos from the party. Oh and PC bonded really well hotel heiress Paris Hilton.
title: PC-Nick Jonas Ring In Future Sister-In-Law Sophie Turner’s Birthday, Party With Paris Hilton
description: The celebrations are endless for Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas. After their lavish wedding in Udaipur and endless receptions in India and the US, now it's time for celebrations again! Nick and PC rang in Game of Thrones star Sophie Turner’s birthday party on February 21. The pictures and videos have flooded social media and the party looked like a complete fam-jam event.
